lst.name: sentence
lst.str: That means accelerated public investment, lower interest rates on government housing loans and measures to pass along the benefits of the strong yen to consumers, none of which would have a major immediate economic impact.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: At last week's talks, Japanese officials said, they argued Tokyo had been able to maintain a tight fiscal stance and boost the economy with funds from the giant postal savings system.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Attack represents a distinct shift by the conservative Reagan administration, which until recently has been sympathetic to Tokyo's efforts to reduce the government role in the economy, diplomats said.
